column5: I wish i could say it gets easier with time but that wouldn't be true, at least not for me. I've been dealing with anxiety and depression for 30 years now. Ive had very happy times and very shitty times but guess what im still here fighting on. I see no reason to quit now. This is a mysterious disease we have, it tells us were less than others but i think maybe we have the upper hand. Only when you truly know how sad you can be can you know how happy you can be. All i can say is hang in there because this too shall pass
No i actually loved weed but one day it turned on me and started giving me bad anxiety. I've had anxiety and depression ever since. Its been 30 years now and i still cant smoke it. Thats y it sucks!
Wish weed helped my anxiety.  It just makes it worse in my case! Sucks hard!
I was thinking of doing tms therapy but what would i do if it actually worked and i had to actually feel and see the destruction me and my depression left behind?
I did make an appointment with her tomorrow to see whats going on.
Going to see my new primary care doctor tomorrow,  any advice about getting a benzo prescribed.  My psychiatrist cant because of the program im in. She said i could see if one would?

Xmas is a bitch because i can remember such beautiful ones! My anxiety has been on overload since last night and now i have to go spend time with the family. Supposed to get some xanax tomorrow and then ill be a little merrier i hooe!
The only time you should run is from the cops! üòÅ
Ive had it for thirty years and anxiety 2. People suck! They dont care enough about theyre brother man.
Post acute withdrawal syndrome,  it can take years.
Used very wisely. I agree.

Dude i been there, still am kinda there. Was doing 10 grams a day for 2 years. Went of CT and lost 3 days of my life  dont know what i did. Didn't get arrested so i must have just slept. √åhave paws now and it sucks. I know i completely abused the drug and that not the drugs fault. Just take caution and if you have an addictive personality stay the hell away from it!
No and I need 2.
Ok. Thanks and I hope they do!
Yes there is. Been off it for almost a year and still feel like shit sometimes.  I was at 10 grams a day for 2 years though
Sad that the 500 is history. I have a 2016 turbo
At least it came back. Hopefully mine will 2
You obviously didn't do as much as me. Try 10 grams a day for 2 years and get back to me.
Your a dick and a half sir!
That's good. I wouldn't even do that much though.  My tolerance did go up
Not yet. I have to find a new pcp
Well there's a couple other guys on here that say otherwise.
It isn't
And I quit CT. I lost 3 days of my life. No idea what happened,  dont remember.
Exactly
10 grams a day, broken down into 4 times a day
10 grams a day maybe more
Ty. I just thought I was alone with these withdrawal symptoms
That stuffs shit and it'll ruin your life and turn you into someone you don't know or even want too

I'm 53 years old. Smoked like a nut in my teens and early 20s then the hell started. Weed induced anxiety and depression. Got my legal weed card in pa and thought I would try it again.  Saw a nurse practitioner at the dispensary and really thought I'd be ok but soon as I took a hit, fucking anxiety again. Been going thru sum shit so I'm gonna take a break again.
